item.title: Guest Speaker: Christophe Baroux
item.description: The Innovation of Docker Inc. Christophe Baroux works at Docker Inc. Docker Inc. is a company that leads in the containerization market, that combines enterprise-grade container platform with services to give developers and IT the freedom to build, manage and transfer applications. Some of their clients include BCG Gamma, PayPal and ADP. In class, he guest lectured on Docker’s capabilities, the potential of a career in cloud services sales and assisted Ghislan on educating students about the world of Cloud.
